nodes.bodyText: Are we not checking if drops fit anymore? Old code had a if (menu.fits(drop, getOutputSlots())) check, I don't see why we would skip it

I intentionally removed it because it seemed redundant. When we push items that dont fit, nothing really happens.
So checking if items don't fit and then simply doing nothing instead kinda leads to the same outcome anyway. That's why I removed it.
